items.content_html: Televault is a modern, lightweight image hosting platform built with Next.js and powered by the Telegram Bot API. It lets users upload, store, and retrieve images through Telegram — turning Telegram into your personal, unlimited photo cloud.

items.content_html: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.
items.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

items.content_html: This is a lightweight module for implementing remote asynchronous function calls (RPC) between different scripts using various transports, like WebSockets. It allows calling functions on a remote API and routing responses with minimal configuration.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
